text:
League 1
Toulouse-OL: what time and on which channel?
Olympique Lyonnais is on the turf of Toulouse this Saturday, November 2, 2019, on behalf of the 12th day of Ligue 1. A meeting broadcast live on French television. On which channel and at what time? Answer in this article.
02 Nov 2019, 05:45 by Florian Sermaise



Olympique Lyonnais is getting back in shape. A week after having gleaned their first success in the league since the second day in mid-August against FC Metz (2-0), the men of Rudi Garcia this time have a meeting in Toulouse on the occasion of the 12th day Ligue 1. An encounter just as crucial as against the Lorrainers seven days ago since the Gones, 13th, are only one point ahead of T√©f√©c√©, 17th. For their part, the Violets remain on a stunning defeat against Rennes last weekend. The first of new coach Antoine Kombouar√©. One thing is certain: both teams are already playing big this Saturday night at the Stadium.








This meeting of the 12th day of Ligue 1 between Toulouse and Olympique Lyonnais is to follow live in France this Saturday, November 2, 2019, from 20:00 on the beIN Sports Max 8 channel.
Toulouse-OL on television




Mathieu Dossevi + 14 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This meeting of the 12th day of Ligue 1 between Toulouse and Olympique Lyonnais is to follow live in France this Saturday, November 2, 2019, from 20:00 on the beIN Sports Max 8 channel.
